articles.content:

articles.title: Texas vs. Oklahoma State Prediction, Preview, and Odds - 1-7-2023 - Winners and Whiners
articles.description: The Oklahoma State Cowboys host the Texas Longhorns on Saturday in Big 12 hoops action.
articles.content: The 6th ranked Texas Longhorns had a 6 game winning streak derailed on Tuesday with a 116-103 loss at home to Kansas State. This score might sound more like a game between the NBAs Mavericks and Rock… [+1139 chars]
